Structs/Gradient.html#/s:5Salsa8Gradient.name: colors
Structs/Gradient.html#/s:5Salsa8Gradient.abstract: Array of colors that are contained in the gradient

Structs/Gradient.html#/s:5Salsa8Gradient.abstract: Position of the colors contained in the gradient.

Structs/Gradient.html#/s:5Salsa8Gradient.name: init(colors:locations:start:end:)
Structs/Gradient.html#/s:5Salsa8Gradient.abstract: Creates a linear Gradient to be used as a background to a Shape

Structs/SalsaConfig.html#/s:5Salsa0A6Con.name: exportDirectory
Structs/SalsaConfig.html#/s:5Salsa0A6Con.abstract: Directory in which exported files will be stored.

Structs/SalsaConfig.html#/s:5Salsa0A6Con.name: imageExportDirectory
Structs/SalsaConfig.html#/s:5Salsa0A6Con.abstract: Directory where image assets will be stored

Structs/Document.html#/s:5Salsa8Document.name: textStyles
Structs/Document.html#/s:5Salsa8Document.abstract: Global text styles defined in the document

Structs/Document.html#/s:5Salsa8Document.name: export(fileName:)
Structs/Document.html#/s:5Salsa8Document.abstract: Exports a Document to the directory path specified in SalsaConfig.exportDirectory

Structs/Shadow.html.name: Shadow
Structs/Shadow.html.abstract: Represents a Shadow that can be attached to any Layer

Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.name: artboardElements()
Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.abstract: The only required method that needs to be implemented

Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.name: viewWidth
Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.abstract: Fixed width to use for views provided in artboardElements()

Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.name: artboardInsets
Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.abstract: Insets to the edges of the artboard

Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.name: makeArtboard(origin:)
Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html#/s:.abstract: Generates an Artboard containing examples of the conforming type

Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html.name: ArtboardRepresentable
Protocols/ArtboardRepresentable.html.abstract: Conform your UIView to this protocol to easily create an Artboard for your example views

Protocols/SymbolRepresentable.html.name: SymbolRepresentable
Protocols/SymbolRepresentable.html.abstract: Creates an Artboard and SymbolMasters out of elements provided by artboardElements().

Protocols/SketchNestable.html.name: SketchNestable
Protocols/SketchNestable.html.abstract: Conform a UIView to this type in order for it to be picked up as a nested Symbol

Functions.html#/s:5Salsa23makeArtboardsA.name: makeArtboardsAndSymbols(from:padding:)
Functions.html#/s:5Salsa23makeArtboardsA.abstract: Creates laid out artboards and symbols for the given ArtboardRepresentable types

Extensions/CGRect.html#/s:SC6CGRectV5Sal.name: combined(with:)
Extensions/CGRect.html#/s:SC6CGRectV5Sal.abstract: Creates a new CGRect that wraps both self and the passed in CGRect

Extensions/UIFont.html#/s:So6UIFontC5Sal.abstract: Converts the name of the font as it appears in iOS to a name that Sketch can understand

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@obj.name: sketchName
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@obj.abstract: The name that will be given to groups representing this view.

Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@obj.name: makeSketchGroup()
Extensions/UIView.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@obj.abstract: Creates a Group that mirrors the layout of the view

Extensions/UIToolbar.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@.name: contentLayers()
Extensions/UIToolbar.html#/c:@CM@Salsa@@.abstract: Overrides contentLayers to provide a background image

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC5S.name: makeSketchColor()
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC5S.abstract: Creates a Color with the same RGB values as self

Classes/SymbolMaster.html#/s:5Salsa12Sym.name: init(name:frame:layers:)
Classes/SymbolMaster.html#/s:5Salsa12Sym.abstract: Creates a SymbolMaster that can be referenced by a SymbolInstance

Classes/BezierPath.html#/s:5Salsa10Bezie.name: cgPath
Classes/BezierPath.html#/s:5Salsa10Bezie.abstract: Creates a CGPath equivalent to the given BezierPath

Classes/BezierPath.html#/s:5Salsa10Bezie.name: isClosed
Classes/BezierPath.html#/s:5Salsa10Bezie.abstract: Wether the first and last points in the path are equal to eachother

Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeC8grad.name: gradient
Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeC8grad.abstract: Optional gradient. If this is set then backgroundColor is ignored

Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeC6isMa.name: isMask
Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeC6isMa.abstract: If this is true then this Shape will act as a mask for all layers below it

Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeCACSS4.abstract: Creates a generic Shape layer in Sketch

Classes/Shape.html#/s:5Salsa5ShapeCACSS4.abstract: Creates a rectangular Shape layer in Sketch. Use this to be able to surface corner radius sliders in sketch

Classes/LayerContainer.html#/s:5Salsa14L.name: init(json:)
Classes/LayerContainer.html#/s:5Salsa14L.abstract: Do not use this directly, use makeLayer(json:) instead

Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerC4name.name: name
Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerC4name.abstract: Name of the Layer as it appears in Sketch

Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerC5fram.name: frame
Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerC5fram.abstract: Frame of the layer inside its parent

Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerCACSgs.name: init(json:)
Classes/Layer.html#/s:5Salsa5LayerCACSgs.abstract: Do not use this directly, use makeLayer(json:) instead

Classes/Group.html#/s:5Salsa5GroupC5alph.name: alpha
Classes/Group.html#/s:5Salsa5GroupC5alph.abstract: Transparency applied to all elements inside the group

Classes/Group.html#/s:5Salsa5GroupCACSC6.name: init(frame:layers:alpha:name:shadow:)
Classes/Group.html#/s:5Salsa5GroupCACSC6.abstract: Constructs a Group containing the given layers

Classes/Color.html#/s:5Salsa5ColorCAC12C.name: init(red:green:blue:alpha:)
Classes/Color.html#/s:5Salsa5ColorCAC12C.abstract: Creates a Color in RGB color space. Parameter values should be from 0 to 1

Classes/Bitmap.html#/s:5Salsa6BitmapC8fi.name: fileName
Classes/Bitmap.html#/s:5Salsa6BitmapC8fi.abstract: References the name of an image thats stored in SalsaConfig.imageExportDirectory.

Classes/Bitmap.html#/s:5Salsa6BitmapC9ti.name: tintColor
Classes/Bitmap.html#/s:5Salsa6BitmapC9ti.abstract: Overrides the Color of the images, works the same way as setting tintColor on UIImageView on iOS

Classes/Artboard.html#/s:5Salsa8Artboard.name: init(name:layers:frame:color:)
Classes/Artboard.html#/s:5Salsa8Artboard.abstract: Constructs an Artboard that contains the given layers

Classes/Text/Segment.html#/s:5Salsa4Text.name: init(text:style:)
Classes/Text/Segment.html#/s:5Salsa4Text.abstract: Creates a Segment to be used inside of a Text layer

Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.name: fontDescriptor
Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.abstract: Name of the font as it appears in macOS.

Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.name: alignment
Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.abstract: Whether the Segment is left, right, or center aligned. The alignment of the first Segment in a Text layer will be inhereted by all other segments

Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.name: init(fontDescriptor:fontSize:color:alignment:isUnderlined:)
Classes/Text/Style.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC5.abstract: Creates a Style used for styling a Segment of Text

Classes/Text.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC04wrapB.name: wrapText
Classes/Text.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC04wrapB.abstract: Whether the text should wrap or stay on a single line

Classes/Text.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC8segmen.name: segments
Classes/Text.html#/s:5Salsa4TextC8segmen.abstract: List of Text segments in left to right order as they appear in the Text container

Classes/Text/Style.html.name: Style
Classes/Text/Style.html.abstract: A struct containing styling information about a string

Classes/Text/SharedStyle.html.name: SharedStyle
Classes/Text/SharedStyle.html.abstract: Container for representing Styles that are shared within a document

Classes/Text/Segment.html.name: Segment
Classes/Text/Segment.html.abstract: Represents a styled segment of a string

Classes/Group.html.name: Group
Classes/Group.html.abstract: Represents a Group in Sketch. Container for other layer types.

Classes/LayerContainer.html.name: LayerContainer
Classes/LayerContainer.html.abstract: A type of Layer that can contains other layers.

Classes/SymbolMaster.html.name: SymbolMaster
Classes/SymbolMaster.html.abstract: Represents a SymbolMaster in sketch, these should go in their own special separate Symbols Page.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
